verses.text:
\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*. \w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, \add and\add* his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*.  +  r 149.1  t Praise…: Heb. Hallelujah *

Let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in him that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him: let the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* be \w joyful|strong="H1523"\w* in their \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 149.2 \ft in him…: Heb. in his Makers\f*

Let them \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* in the \w dance|strong="H4234"\w*: let them sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto him with the \w timbrel|strong="H8596"\w* and \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*.\f + \fr 149.3 \ft in…: or, with the pipe\f*

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* taketh \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* in his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: he will \w beautify|strong="H6286"\w* the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* with \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
Let the \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* be \w joyful|strong="H5937"\w* in \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: let them sing \w aloud|strong="H7442"\w* upon their \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*.

\add Let\add* the \w high|strong="H7319"\w* \add praises\add* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add be\add* in their \w mouth|strong="H1627"\w*, and a \w twoedged|strong="H6374"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*;\f + \fr 149.6 \ft mouth: Heb. throat\f*
To \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* upon the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, \add and\add* \w punishments|strong="H8433"\w* upon the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*;
To \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* with \w chains|strong="H2131"\w*, and their \w nobles|strong="H3513"\w* with \w fetters|strong="H3525"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*;

To \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* upon them the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*: this \w honour|strong="H1926"\w* have all his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*.
